FuncDef:
The bgp yang-mode enable command enables the YANG management mode for BGP VPN instances and BGP multi-instance VPN instances.
The undo bgp yang-mode enable command disables the YANG management mode for BGP VPN instances and BGP multi-instance VPN instances. The bgp yang-mode enable command enables the YANG management mode for BGP VPN instances and BGP multi-instance VPN instances. The undo bgp yang-mode enable command disables the YANG management mode for BGP VPN instances and BGP multi-instance VPN instances. By default, the YANG management mode of BGP and BGP multi-instance is disabled.
Examples: Warning: All the configurations of the BGP VPN instance and its peers and peer groups will be changed to configurations that can be delivered using the YANG model. Continue? [Y/N]:Y
ExtraInfo: To configure and manage BGP private network instances and BGP multi-instance private network instances in huawei-bgp.yang, you need to enable the YANG-based management mode of the BGP private network instances on the device or globally enable the leaf node (/bgp:bgp/bgp:global/bgp:yang-enable) through the YANG model file.
